description:
Write a program that accepts a binary number as input and converts it into its integer representation.

#### Input Format:

`The input consists of a single line containing a binary number.`

#### Output Format:

`Print the integer representation of the binary number.`

#### `Sample Input:`

```
10101
```

#### `Sample Output:`

```
21
```

#### `Constraints:`

- `The input binary number will have at most 31 bits.`
- `The binary number can contain only 0s and 1s.`
title: Binary to Integer
